Multiculture.heading: EXPERIENCE a
Multiculture.description: Experience a kaleidoscope of traditions and flavors in Malaysia, where the vibrant tapestry of Malay, Chinese, and Indian cultures creates a unique and enriching daily life.

Scenery.heading: BREATHTAKING
Scenery.description: The creator of Penang murals, artist Ernest Zacharevic said: "Everyone is an artist. When they see these murals on the street, they can interpret them in their own way, and they are finished The second creation of art."

Heritage.heading: UNESCO
Heritage.description: Explore the enchanting blend of history, culture, and flavors in Penang, where UNESCO-listed streets adorned with vibrant street art weave through a culinary haven of diverse, mouthwatering delights
